headline: Stocks sink, Robinhood & Cognizant on the move: Market Minute
summary: Here is the latest news moving markets today in the latest Market Minute. All three of the major indexes (^DJI, ^GSPC, ^IXIC) are trading sharply lower, with the "Magnificent Seven" leading the way. Robinhood (HOOD) shares are among the stocks that are falling as investors sell crypto-related stocks. The company also recently agreed to pay nearly $30 million to settle regulatory probes. One stock on the rise is Cognizant Technology Solutions (CTSH). Shares are moving higher following a Wall Street Journal report that activist investor Mantle Ridge is building a stake in the tech company. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute. This post was written by Stephanie Mikulich.
